caption:
The photograph captures a scene of environmental degradation featuring a junkyard flooded with water. In the foreground, a large puddle reflects the cloud-filled sky and contains several sunken objects that resemble rocks or debris, littered among submerged, discarded automobile parts. The middle ground of the image shows a variety of old, damaged cars piled haphazardly. These vehicles, mostly with their paint faded and structures twisted, are half-submerged in the water, contributing to a sense of abandonment and decay.

In the background, the landscape opens up to a more rural or semi-industrial area, with sparse buildings and other piles of discarded materials scattered across a flat field. Beyond this, the scene meets a dramatic backdrop of snow-capped mountain ranges under a vast, cloud-speckled sky, emphasizing a stark contrast between natural beauty and human wastefulness.

The overall composition of the image—using the reflection in the water, the clutter of neglected cars, and the distant mountains—creates a powerful commentary on pollution and the impact of human activities on nature.
title: This five acre acid water, oil and sludge filled pond was used as a dumpsite by commercial firms before being cleaned up under epa supervision.  It offered no protection to unwary animals.  Sheep carcasses are seen in the foreground and at the left along with junked cars and other debris
